thread.title: Investing during times of global turmoil
thread.title_full: Investing during times of global turmoil

title: Investing during times of global turmoil
text: Investing during times of global turmoil 11 Jul 2015, 9:44PM IST Copy URL Embed In this episode of Investor's Guide, Dhirendra Kumar tells us how to manage our investments during times of global turmoil, like the recent events in Greece and China. Dhirendra also discusses SBI Magnum Fund and provides a model portfolio of mutual funds. Also, Feroze Azeez, Deputy CEO at Anand Rathi Pvt Wealth Management, answers viewers' queries on mutual funds. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 23 views
